snippet.title: Monolith Teaser 2023
snippet.description:
Teaser for our upcoming science-fiction point and click adventure game "Monolith".
Check out the game play / voice demo video on the channel!

Follow us on our social media accounts to get more informations about the game.

https://www.instagram.com/animationartsgames/
https://twitter.com/Anim_Arts
https://www.facebook.com/Animation-Ar...
